tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT, username VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(255), password VARCHAR(255), PRIMARY KEY(user_id));

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  profile_picture BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_details (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_id INT,
  receiver_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  currency VARCHAR(3),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (sender_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (receiver_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT NOT NULL,
    receiver_id INT NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
   transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   sender_id INT,
   receiver_id INT,
   amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
   FOREIGN KEY (sender_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (receiver_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE payment_methods (
   method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   user_id INT,
   method_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   details JSON,
   FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_logs (
   log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   user_id INT,
   log_details TEXT,
   log_timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
   FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);
